channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- DGX A100/A800
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- DGX A100/A800

item.title: CVE-2023-25521|2024-08-02T11:25:18.569Z -- nvidia -- dgx%20a100%2Fa800
item.description: NVIDIA DGX A100/A800 contains a vulnerability in SBIOS where an attacker may cause execution with unnecessary privileges by leveraging a weakness whereby proper input parameter validation is not performed. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to denial of service, information disclosure, and data tampering.

item.title: CVE-2023-25522|2024-08-02T11:25:18.387Z -- nvidia -- dgx%20a100%2Fa800
item.description: NVIDIA DGX A100/A800 contains a vulnerability in SBIOS where an attacker may cause improper input validation by providing configuration information in an unexpected format. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to denial of service, information disclosure, and data tampering.
